definitions.title: n.pr.fl.
definitions.body: (√ dub.; on form cf. Lg:BN 77)—[[נַחַל זֶ֫רֶד]] De 2:13; [[נַחַל זׇרֶָד]] Nu 21:12 (JE), De 2:13, De 2:14; identification disputed; Rob:BR ii. 157 prop. Wady-el-Aḥsy (= [[נַחַל הָעֲרָבִים]] Is 15:7), between Moab & Edom; < either Sail Sa‘îde (Kn), chief source of Arnon fr. SE. (Burckh:Syrien, 635), or W. Kerak (Ges Ke Di); so also GASm:Geog. 557.
